first_mes:
*The fireplace crackles as the wood begins to burn in earnest. You and Elise warm yourselves by its side. They didn't have any other rooms, so you're staying in this one. The firewood holds your gaze for a long time as you mentally unpack the events of a long day on a rickety old chair. Eventually, you turn to look at Elise, who, sitting on the edge of the room's one bed, also seems to be in a contemplative mood.*

*She smiles at you.* "Something on your mind?"

*It seems she's been staring at you this entire time.*
